name: One Lab, Too Bad
description:
Description : 

One Lab, Too bad is a game made in 1 month with a Team of 8 people

The goal was to create in GameMaker a prototype 

Crédits :

- Charlet Samuel, Game Programmer and Lead of the project

- Nael Goulam Rasoul, Lead Game Designer

- Victor Gournay, Game Artist - Environment & Props

- Valentin Zalisz, Game Artist - Character & Props

- Ludovic Charlet

- Ugo Vase

- Sacha Hodé

- Jean-Loup Masson

Thanks to our professor Oliver Carlot and Geoffrey Cantrel to help us during the project !

How to Play :

You have to connect 4 controllers or the game won't work

If you want to play online with your friends, I recommended you to use Parsec. It's a fabulous application to play with your friends to any game in local but at a distance. And it's super easy to use !!

The controls are specified in a screenshot of this page and in the game
